item.title: Delivery lorry (white) to At Joseph's School knocked over crossing light, 4th August
item.description:

item.title: Excessive household waste on street/road, 4th August
item.description:
There had been excessive household waste accumulating outside the building block for days (exacerbated by crows) and not all items were fully removed by the council, meaning several items have been strewn across both the pavement and road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Eagle Wharf Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large build up of leaves, 4th August
item.description:

item.description:
